title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Multi-Region strong consistency with Amazon DynamoDB global tables (DAT440)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon DynamoDB 全局表实现多区域强一致性 (DAT440)
abstract: Join this session to learn how multi-Region strong consistency mode for Amazon DynamoDB global tables helps you build highly resilient applications across Regions. Explore the advantages of this innovative functionality, learn how to identify which use cases will benefit most, and discover how to choose the optimal global tables mode for your workloads. Deep dive on how AWS built DynamoDB global tables with multi-Region strong consistency and see a practical demo of the feature. Leave this session ready to leverage multi-Region strong consistency with your applications.
abstract_cn: 加入本次会议，了解 Amazon DynamoDB 全局表的多区域强一致性模式如何帮助您构建跨区域的高弹性应用程序。探索这一创新功能的优势，学习如何识别哪些用例将从中受益最多，并了解如何为您的工作负载选择最佳的全局表模式。深入了解 AWS 如何构建具有多区域强一致性的 DynamoDB 全局表，并观看该功能的实际演示。在本次会议结束时，您将能够在应用程序中充分利用多区域强一致性。
